[[File:Bag_Grass_Egg_Sprite.png|thumb|120px|Grass Egg]] A '''Grass Egg''' is a type of Pokémon [[Egg]] that can hatch Grass-type Pokémon. ==Details== ===Hatch Table=== {| class="wikitable sortable" |- ! Kanto !! Johto !! Hoenn !! Sinnoh !! Unova !! Kalos |- | [[File:Bulbasaur.png|40px]] Bulbasaur || [[File:Chikorita.png|40px]] Chikorita || Treecko || Turtwig || Snivy || Chespin |- | [[File:Oddish.png|40px]] Oddish || [[File:Hoppip.png|40px]] Hoppip || Roselia || Carnivine || Pansage ||
--- |- | [[File:Bellsprout.png|40px]] Bellsprout || [[File:Sunkern.png|40px]] Sunkern || Tropius || Budew ||

Price |- | [[Shops#Kanto:_Locations_and_items|Lavender Town]] || | 1000 {{Questpoints}} |- | [[Shops#Johto:_Locations_and_items|Azalea City]] || | 1000 {{Questpoints}} |- | [[Shops#Hoenn:_Locations_and_items|Verdanturf Town]] || | 1000 {{Questpoints}} |- | [[Shops#Sinnoh:_Locations_and_items|Eterna City]] || | 1000 {{Questpoints}} |- | [[Shops#Unova:_Locations_and_items|Nimbasa City]] || | 1000 {{Questpoints}} |- | [[Shops#Kalos:_Locations_and_items|Courmarine City]] || | 1000 {{Questpoints}} |} {{Eggs}}
